text: Our website may use these "cookies" to keep you signed in to our Service.
QRev transfers, processes and stores data about you on servers operated by our hosting provider located in the United States of America.

We don't share any third-party services or AI models access to any data that Google provides.
We only use the keyboard input that the user provides, and we provide LLM with this data so that we can better respond to the user's query.

How we Share and Disclose Personal Data
